name: Dunkman
description:
Keep the ball away from the defenders’ hands until you get to the slam dunk!

Also playable here: https://tic.computer/play?cart=1179

Dunkman is a basketball-themed minigame created for Ludum Dare

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/dunkman

Made in TIC-80

Project page and source: https://github.com/cxong/Dunkman
